info.title: SuperOffice Agent API v1
info.termsOfService: You must be an authorized user to access this API.

post.summary: Update the cached FeatureToggles for CS

parameters.name: request
parameters.description: FeatureToggles

parameters.name: $select
parameters.description: Optional comma separated list of properties to include in the result. Other fields are then nulled out to reduce payload size: "Name,department,category". Default = show all fields.

parameters.name: SO-AppToken
parameters.description: The application token that identifies the partner app. Used when calling Online WebAPI from a server.

post.summary: Check if an eventhandler exists for a given enum

parameters.name: request
parameters.description: EventHandlerType

parameters.name: $select
parameters.description: Optional comma separated list of properties to include in the result. Other fields are then nulled out to reduce payload size: "Name,department,category". Default = show all fields.

parameters.name: Accept-Language
parameters.description: Convert string references and multi-language values into a specified language (iso2) code.

parameters.name: SO-Language
parameters.description: Convert string references and multi-language values into a specified language (iso2) code. Overrides Accept-Language value.

parameters.name: SO-Culture
parameters.description: Number, date formatting in a specified culture (iso2 language) code. Partially overrides SO-Language/Accept-Language value. Ignored if no Language set.

parameters.name: SO-TimeZone
parameters.description: Specify the timezone code that you would like date/time responses converted to.

parameters.name: SO-AppToken
parameters.description: The application token that identifies the partner app. Used when calling Online WebAPI from a server.

post.summary: Get a FAQ entry, ment to be displayed for a customer.
post.description:
This can either be a link to the FAQ entry on Custom Center, or it can be the answer and question. This is dependent on Registry setting with reg_id=157
NsApiSlow threshold: 5000 ms.

SuperOffice.WebApi.v1.Carriers.CustomerS.description: UpdateFeatureToggles: Update the cached FeatureToggles for CS

SuperOffice.CRM.Services.CsFeatureToggle.description:
Carrier object for CsFeatureToggle.
Services for the CsFeatureToggle Carrier is available from the <see cref="T:SuperOffice.CRM.Services.ICustomerServiceAgent">CustomerService Agent</see>.

State.description: Describes if the feature toggle is turned on or off

FieldProperties.description: Field property dictionary mapping field names to field access rights.

SuperOffice.CRM.Security.TableRight.description:
Wraps a table right together with an explanatory reason.
Code can indicate why access is restricted.

SuperOffice.CRM.Security.FieldProperty.description: Class holding properties like field length, field type about a field in the carrier.

SuperOffice.CRM.Security.FieldRight.description:
Wraps the field right together with an explanatory reason.
Also adds logical operators to the field rights so that they can be easily combined.

SuperOffice.WebApi.v1.Carriers.CustomerS.description: EventHandlerExists: Check if an eventhandler exists for a given enum
EventHandlersExists: Check if any given eventhandler exists
CreateSession: Creates a login session for a CS user

SuperOffice.CRM.Services.CsSessionKey.description:
Carrier object for CsSessionKey.
Services for the CsSessionKey Carrier is available from the <see cref="T:SuperOffice.CRM.Services.ICustomerServiceAgent">CustomerService Agent</see>.

Key.description: The session key created in the login table

LoginId.description: The id of the login row

UserId.description: The ejuser id owning this session key

FieldProperties.description: Field property dictionary mapping field names to field access rights.

SuperOffice.WebApi.v1.Carriers.CustomerS.description: RemoveSession: Remove a login session for a CS user
SessionIsValid: Check if a CS session is valid
CheckSymmetricEncryption: Do a test to check that we are using the same encryption keys
ReportSessionActive: Report a session as being 'active'; will update the corresponding row in login table, but not more than once per minute/session

SuperOffice.CRM.Services.CustomerCenterC.description:
Contains configuration when displaying the Customer Center
<para />
Carrier object for CustomerCenterConfig.
Services for the CustomerCenterConfig Carrier is available from the <see cref="T:SuperOffice.CRM.Services.ICustomerServiceAgent">CustomerService Agent</see>.

Type.description: What kind of data is in this row

CustLangId.description: The customer language which this config belongs to. 0 indicates that the config is global

FieldProperties.description: Field property dictionary mapping field names to field access rights.

SuperOffice.WebApi.v1.Carriers.CustomerS.description: SaveAllCustomerCenterConfigs: Save an array of CustomerCenterConfig entities to the database
GetProgramUrl: This method will convert a module name into a Service URL.

GetFaqForCustomer: Get a FAQ entry, ment to be displayed for a customer. This can either be a link to the FAQ entry on Custom Center, or it can be the answer and question. This is dependent on Registry setting with reg_id=157

SuperOffice.CRM.Services.CustomerService.description:
This carrier contains various data needed by Service for startup. Do not use this API, as it is for internal use and might change without notice
<para />
Carrier object for CustomerServiceStartup.
Services for the CustomerServiceStartup Carrier is available from the <see cref="T:SuperOffice.CRM.Services.ICustomerServiceAgent">CustomerService Agent</see>.

TZOffset.description: The offset in minutes compared with UTC, calculated for DateTime.Now

RecaptchaSiteKey.description: A global recaptcha site key, used with the google recaptcha component. This value is taken from the web.config file

SelectedPreferences.description: An array of selected preferences needed by Service

FieldProperties.description: Field property dictionary mapping field names to field access rights.

SuperOffice.CRM.Services.Preference.description:
One preference item, which contains a specification (section/key), the raw string value, and the level at which this value was found.
<para />
Carrier object for Preference.
Services for the Preference Carrier is available from the <see cref="T:SuperOffice.CRM.Services.IPreferenceAgent">Preference Agent</see>.

Level.description: Preference level, using the standard enumerated type. Undefined is returned for preferences that do not have a current setting.

Specification.description: Preference specification, consisting of the section name and key name

DisplayValue.description: Display value, populated when asked for. Suitable for binding display-datasource in lists, etc. Formatted using CultureDataFormatter.

DisplayTooltip.description: Display tooltip, populated when asked for. Suitable for binding display-datasource in lists, etc. Formatted using CultureDataFormatter.

DisplayType.description: Display type, populated when asked for.

TargetId.description: The id of the target row. The table it points at is specified by the preference type.

PrefDescId.description: The id of the prefdesc this preference is connected to

TableName.description: For DisplayType=PrefDescValueType.ListTableRef, TableName will contain the name of the table which the value reference to.

UserPreferenceId.description: The id of the user preference

FieldProperties.description: Field property dictionary mapping field names to field access rights.

SuperOffice.CRM.Services.PreferenceSpec.description:
Preference specification, consisting of the section name and key name
<para />
Carrier object for PreferenceSpec.
Services for the PreferenceSpec Carrier is available from the <see cref="T:SuperOffice.CRM.Services.IPreferenceAgent">Preference Agent</see>.

FieldProperties.description: Field property dictionary mapping field names to field access rights.

SuperOffice.CRM.Services.TabOrder.description:
Carrier object for TabOrder.
Services for the TabOrder Carrier is available from the <see cref="T:SuperOffice.CRM.Services.IPreferenceAgent">Preference Agent</see>.

AssociateId.description: Associate who owns this tab order

FieldProperties.description: Field property dictionary mapping field names to field access rights.

SuperOffice.WebApi.v1.Carriers.CustomerS.description: GetCustomerServiceStartupByOwner: Get the carrier with data that Service needs when starting up for a specific user
ExecuteEventHandlers: This method will execute event handlers in CRMScript for a given event.

SuperOffice.CRM.Services.EventData.description:
EventData containing data related to event handlers
<para />
Carrier object for EventData.
Services for the EventData Carrier is available from the <see cref="T:SuperOffice.CRM.Services.ICustomerServiceAgent">CustomerService Agent</see>.

Type.description: The type of event we are triggered by

InputValues.description: Environment values sent to the event handler

BlockExecution.description: Whether the context should stop what it is doing, e.g. saving a sale

NavigateTo.description: Where the context should naviate afterwards

Message.description: A message to be presented to the user

ShowDialog.description: JSON structure of dialog to show

OutputValues.description: Values sent back to the environment from the event handler

Exception.description: String containing error message from handler system if it failed

ParserValues.description: Parser values sent to the event handler

CgiVariables.description: Cgi variables sent by some events

CgiContent.description: The Cgi content/body, sent by some events

Headers.description: Incoming headers if sent by the context which the script is executed from

TraceExecution.description: If true, then the execution will be traced

FieldProperties.description: Field property dictionary mapping field names to field access rights.

SuperOffice.CRM.Services.Mailbox.description:
Carrier containing information about a Service mailbox
<para />
Carrier object for Mailbox.
Services for the Mailbox Carrier is available from the <see cref="T:SuperOffice.CRM.Services.ICustomerServiceAgent">CustomerService Agent</see>.

Address.description: The address associated with this mailbox (used as FROM: address when sending emails).

CategoryName.description: The name of the category that the mailbox is connected to

PriorityName.description: The name of the priority that the mailbox is connected to

FieldProperties.description: Field property dictionary mapping field names to field access rights.

SuperOffice.CRM.Services.MailboxEntity.description:
This entity represent a mailbox used for importing emails in Service
<para />
Carrier object for MailboxEntity.
Services for the MailboxEntity Carrier is available from the <see cref="T:SuperOffice.CRM.Services.ICustomerServiceAgent">CustomerService Agent</see>.

ServerType.description: Enum indicating the protocol to use (POP/IMAP).

Address.description: The address associated with this mailbox (used as FROM: address when sending emails).

Username.description: The username used to log onto the mail account

Password.description: The password used to log into the mail account. This is hidden when reading

Server.description: The email server to connect to

Port.description: The port used to connect to the server

FieldProperties.description: Field property dictionary mapping field names to field access rights.

SuperOffice.WebApi.v1.Carriers.CustomerS.description: GetPreviewFaqEntry: Get a faq entry from its faq entry id

SuperOffice.CRM.Services.PreviewFaqEntry.description:
A faq entry with information suitable for preview.
<para />
Carrier object for PreviewFaqEntry.
Services for the PreviewFaqEntry Carrier is available from the <see cref="T:SuperOffice.CRM.Services.ICustomerServiceAgent">CustomerService Agent</see>.

RegisteredByFullName.description: Full name of associate that created this faq entry

Updated.description: Date/time this faq entry was last updated.

FieldProperties.description: Field property dictionary mapping field names to field access rights.

SuperOffice.CRM.Services.PreviewQuickRep.description:
A quick reply with information suitable for preview.
<para />
Carrier object for PreviewQuickReply.
Services for the PreviewQuickReply Carrier is available from the <see cref="T:SuperOffice.CRM.Services.ICustomerServiceAgent">CustomerService Agent</see>.

Name.description: The short name of the quick reply

UpdatedByFullName.description: Full name of associate last updating this quick reply

Updated.description: Date/time this quick reply was last updated.

HtmlBody.description: Quick reply body in HTML format.

FieldProperties.description: Field property dictionary mapping field names to field access rights.

A reply template with information suitable for preview.
<para />
Carrier object for PreviewReplyTemplate.
Services for the PreviewReplyTemplate Carrier is available from the <see cref="T:SuperOffice.CRM.Services.ICustomerServiceAgent">CustomerService Agent</see>.

Name.description: The name for this reply template.

Description.description: The description for this reply template.

OwnedByFullName.description: Full name of the associate that owns this reply template

Updated.description: Date/time this reply template was last updated.

Body.description: Reply template body in the best available format.

FieldProperties.description: Field property dictionary mapping field names to field access rights.

SuperOffice.WebApi.v1.Carriers.CustomerS.description: GetParsedTemplate: Get a specific langauge version of the reply template, and run this trough the parser

SuperOffice.CRM.Services.ReplyTemplatePa.description:
Reply template with parsed text. Represent one language version of reply template
<para />
Carrier object for ReplyTemplateParsed.
Services for the ReplyTemplateParsed Carrier is available from the <see cref="T:SuperOffice.CRM.Services.ICustomerServiceAgent">CustomerService Agent</see>.

PlainParsed.description: The plain text version of the reply template, and if applicable parsed with customer and ticket data

HtmlParsed.description: The HTML version of the reply template, and if applicable parsed with customer and ticket data

Attachments.description: Meta data for the connected attachments

Subject.description: The subject for this reply template

FieldProperties.description: Field property dictionary mapping field names to field access rights.

SuperOffice.CRM.Services.AttachmentEntit.description:
The Attachment carrier represent meta data for a Service attachment
<para />
Carrier object for AttachmentEntity.
Services for the AttachmentEntity Carrier is available from the <see cref="T:SuperOffice.CRM.Services.ITicketAgent">Ticket Agent</see>.

ContentType.description: The content type for the attachment (e.g. &apos;applaction/octet-stream&apos; or &apos;application/vnd.openxmlformats-officedocument.wordprocessingml.document&apos;).

AttSize.description: The size (in bytes) for the attachment.

InlineImage.description: True if this attachment is inlined in the html_body.

ContentId.description: The content_id of this attachment, used for inline images

AuthKey.description: The key used for authenticating access to this attachment.

IsSafeFileExtension.description: Is file considered to be safe (based on extension and settings)

FieldProperties.description: Field property dictionary mapping field names to field access rights.

SuperOffice.WebApi.v1.Carriers.CustomerS.description: GetUnparsedTemplate: Get a specific langauge version of the reply template. No parsing is performed.

SuperOffice.CRM.Services.SmsConfig.description:
Sms settings for Customer Service sms providers.
<para />
Carrier object for SmsConfig.
Services for the SmsConfig Carrier is available from the <see cref="T:SuperOffice.CRM.Services.ICustomerServiceAgent">CustomerService Agent</see>.

DefaultSmsCountry.description: Phone prefix, will default to the current users HomeCountryId.

NetServerSmsProvider.description: Name of the selected provider, i.e. CM, Compaya SMS (cpsms.dk), Intelecom SMS, PSWinCom SMS, SMS Teknik or TXTLocal.

NsPluginSender.description: The sender of the SMS messages. This text will appear on the recipient's mobile phone.

NsPluginConfig.description: Configuration settings provided by the SMS provider. Typically contains newline-delimited settings such as username and password.

FieldProperties.description: Field property dictionary mapping field names to field access rights.

SuperOffice.WebApi.v1.Carriers.CustomerS.description: TestSmtpServer: This method will do a test of a SMTP account, by sending an email to a special @superoffice.com account

SuperOffice.CRM.Services.SmtpTestResult.description:
Carrier containing information about the result of a SMTP test
<para />
Carrier object for SmtpTestResult.
Services for the SmtpTestResult Carrier is available from the <see cref="T:SuperOffice.CRM.Services.ICustomerServiceAgent">CustomerService Agent</see>.

Success.description: True if the test went ok. False if it failed. See the error message for details

ErrorMessage.description: If an error occured, this member will contain a description of the error

FieldProperties.description: Field property dictionary mapping field names to field access rights.

SuperOffice.WebApi.v1.Carriers.CustomerS.description: GetStatistics: Returns the calculated results for the required statistics for the Customer Service Status Page

SuperOffice.CRM.Services.StatisticsDataS.description:
Carrier object for StatisticsDataSet.
Services for the StatisticsDataSet Carrier is available from the <see cref="T:SuperOffice.CRM.Services.ICustomerServiceAgent">CustomerService Agent</see>.

Label.description: The label for the data set

FieldProperties.description: Field property dictionary mapping field names to field access rights.

SuperOffice.CRM.Services.StatisticsDataV.description:
This class contains a single data value in a data set, used by CS for Status Screen reports
<para />
Carrier object for StatisticsDataValue.
Services for the StatisticsDataValue Carrier is available from the <see cref="T:SuperOffice.CRM.Services.ICustomerServiceAgent">CustomerService Agent</see>.

Label.description: The label for the data value

Value.description: The value for the data value

FieldProperties.description: Field property dictionary mapping field names to field access rights.

SuperOffice.CRM.Services.SystemTemplateS.description:
System template settings item
<para />
Carrier object for SystemTemplateSettings.
Services for the SystemTemplateSettings Carrier is available from the <see cref="T:SuperOffice.CRM.Services.ICustomerServiceAgent">CustomerService Agent</see>.

CustomerPasswordTemplateId.description: Template for sending password to contacts

CustomerConfirmEmailTemplateId.description: Template for sending confirmation e-mail to contacts

HotlistNewMessageTemplateId.description: Template for notification of a new message in the favourites list

HotlistTicketActivatedTemplateId.description: Template for notification of a activated ticket in the favourites list

UserTicketAlarmTemplateId.description: Template for notification of escalated request

HotlistTicketTakenOverTemplateId.description: Template for notification of reassignment of a request in the favourites list

UserActiveTicketsTemplateId.description: Template for notification of open requests

UserNewMessageTemplateId.description: Template for notification of new message

UserTicketActivatedTemplateId.description: Template for notification of activated request

TicketAlarmHotlistTemplateId.description: Template for notification of an escalated request in the favourites list

FieldProperties.description: Field property dictionary mapping field names to field access rights.

SuperOffice.WebApi.v1.Carriers.CustomerS.description: SaveSystemTemplateSettings: Saves and validates updated system templates. Throws exception if validation fails
CreateTicketFromMailData: This method create a new ticket in the same way as importMail would import an email. It accepts RFC822 formatted data

SuperOffice.CRM.Services.TicketInfo.description:
A small carrier that contains information about a ticket
<para />
Carrier object for TicketInfo.
Services for the TicketInfo Carrier is available from the <see cref="T:SuperOffice.CRM.Services.ICustomerServiceAgent">CustomerService Agent</see>.

TicketId.description: The id of the created ticket

Title.description: The title/subject of the created ticket

OwnerName.description: The name of the owner which the request was assigned to

CategoryName.description: The name of the category for the request

PriorityName.description: The name of the priority for the request

TicketUrl.description: A URL leading directly to the created request. This is a URL ment to be used by a Service user

PersonName.description: The name of the person/customer connected to the ticket

ContactName.description: The name of the contact/company connected to the ticket

FieldProperties.description: Field property dictionary mapping field names to field access rights.

SuperOffice.WebApi.v1.Carriers.CustomerS.description: AddMessageFromMailData: This method will add a message to an existing request in the sam way as importMail would do it from an email. It accepts RFC822 formatted data
FindTicketsByTitleOrId: This method wil search for tickets matching title or id

SuperOffice Password.description:
SuperOffice username:password are passed in Base64-encoded. 

You can also pass inn an unencoded ticket 7T:abc== with the HTTP Authenticate header.

SuperId Authentication.description:
SuperOffice SuperId OAuth implicit flow. 
You need to issue a request to the SuperId authorization URL
    https://online.superoffice.com/login/common/oauth/authorize?response_type=token
      &client_id=670734e0-4c5a-11e3-be9e-a171392e81db
      &redirect_uri=https://example.com/spa/

passing in the application id and redirect URL.

SuperId will log the user in, and redirect to the requested redirect URL with a #payload
containing the access token and claims. (The redirect URL must be registered with SuperId in advance)

   https://example.com/spa#access_token=8A%3aCust12227.AXRrCITpPBvQX3UbIohb
      &token_type=bearer
      &state=
      &expires_in=3600
      &ctx=Cust12227
      &netserver_url=https%3a%2f%2fsod.superoffice.com%2fCust12227%2fRemote%2fServices82%2f

You can take the #access_token value and pass it as the Authenticate HTTP header as a BEARER token.

externalDocs.description: The SuperOffice DevNet Community has more documentation, examples, and discussion forums.
